data.name: Actor
data.description: Benefits: You can mimic the speech of another person or the sounds made by other creatures. You must have heard the person speaking, or heard the creature make the sound, for at least 1 minute. (A successful insight check contested by your impress check allows the listener to detect the fakery)

data.name: Alertness
data.description: Benefits: During the first round of combat you are dealt an additional initiative card, then choose one card to discard

data.name: Avoidance
data.description: Benefits: You have a +5 bonus to all defenses against traps and diseases

data.name: Chainmail Proficiency
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency in Chainmail.

data.name: Covert
data.description: Benefits: You can move up to 20' in a single move action while hidden without having to reroll stealth (Up from 10')

data.name: Diplomat
data.description: Benefits: As a standard action you can persuade up to six hostile creatures and change their attitude to Unfriendly. (Attacking a creature or its allies immediately drops its attitude by three steps)

data.name: Eldritch Senses
data.description: Benefits: You can detect magic as a minor action and you have advantage on checks to detect magic

data.name: Empathic
data.description: Benefits: As a minor action choose one enemy creature. That creature cannot flank you until you use this again.

data.name: Hide Armor Proficiency
data.requirements: Proficiency with Leather Armor, 11 Strength, 11 Dexterity
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency in Hide Armor.

data.name: Implement Proficiency
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency with an implement of your choice (eg a Wand or Staff).

data.name: Leather Armor Proficiency
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency with Leather Armor

data.name: Jack of All Trades
data.description: Benefits: Improve six untrained skills to adept.

data.name: Martial Weapon Proficiency
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency in three martial weapons of your choice

data.name: Medic
data.description: Benefits: During a short rest you can tend to the wounds of up to six creatures. Any creature you're tending to regains additional HP equal to 2 plus your quest bonus

data.name: Minor Magics
data.description: Benefits: Choose three level 0 powers from any power source. You can use them at-will.

data.name: Mounted Combatant
data.description: Benefits: Whenever your mount would take damage, you can redirect it to yourself as a free reaction. You are hardened against that damage.

data.name: Multiclass
data.requirements: You use the same power source as the class you'd like to multiclass into
data.description: Benefits: You may exchange a power for one of the same level and usage (At-Will or Recharge) in another class. Whenever you gain a level you may change the powers exchanged.

data.name: Plate Armor Proficiency
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency in Plate Armor

data.name: Pop Up
data.description: Benefits: You can stand as a minor action

data.name: Rhetoritician
data.description: Benefits: On a social skill check, if you beat the strong success DC by 5 or more, you score a critical success and improve the target's attitude by up to 3 steps

data.name: Scale Armor Proficiency
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency in Scale Armor

data.name: Scholar
data.description: Benefits: You unearth a bonus fact that is guaranteed to be true when you research on a topic you are competent in.

data.name: Shield Proficiency
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency with light and heavy shields

data.name: Simple Weapon Proficiency
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency in all simple weapons

data.name: Skill Proficiency
data.requirements: An 11 in the ability for each skill you choose
data.description: Benefits: Improve two untrained skills to trained.

data.name: Streetwise
data.description: Benefits: Whenever you spend a downtime socializing you make a bonus contact

data.name: Superior Armor Proficiency
data.description:
Prerequisities: 13 Strength or Dexterity

Benefits: You gain proficiency in one superior armor whose base type you are proficient with

data.name: Superior Implement Proficiency
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency with one superior implement whose base type you are proficient in

data.name: Superior Weapon Proficiency
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency in one superior weapon of your choice.

data.name: Tavern Brawler
data.description: Benefits: You gain proficiency with unarmed and improvised weapon attacks, and your damage die with them is increased by one size (d4 -> d6, d6 -> d8, d8 -> d10)

data.name: Thief
data.description:
Benefits: You gain the following attack

Thieve

You snatch an enemy's weapon or implement

Level 1 Attack

Feat

Action: Standard ♦ Special: You must have a free hand ♦ Recharge: Short Rest
Range: Melee 5' ♦ Target: One creature
Attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex

Hit: You steal a one-handed item the target is wielding

data.name: Tinker
data.description: Benefits: During a short rest you can make a Repair check to build an improvised device. The result of the check determines the complexity and power of the device. The device can have any purpose and lasts for one hour.

data.name: Toughness
data.description: Benefits: Your hit points at 1st level is increased by 5, and you gain an additional hit point each level.

data.name: Tracker
data.description: Benefits: Whenever you track a target you learn extra information about them. The quantity and quality of this information is based on your survival check.

data.name: Tumble
data.description: Benefits: You are hardened against falling damage. In addition, after passing through 5' of difficult terrain during a move, you can ignore the next 5' of difficult terrain

data.name: War Magic
data.description: Benefits: Choose one weapon with which you are proficient. You may use that weapon as an implement for your implement powers. (You don't get it's weapon proficiency bonus for implement attacks)

data.name: Well Read
data.description: Benefits: Choose six additional competencies.

data.name: Wrestler
data.description: Benefits: You have a +2 bonus to hit with bull rush, grab, and shove attacks
